scripts.deploy-contracts: cd hardhat && yarn deploy-rrp && yarn deploy-requester
scripts.stop-airnode: docker stop quick-deploy-container-airnode && docker rm quick-deploy-container-airnode
scripts.start-airnode: cd ./airnode && docker run --detach --volume $(pwd)/config:/app/config --name quick-deploy-container-airnode api3/airnode-client:0.3.1 && docker logs --follow quick-deploy-container-airnode
